about_the_game:
Mariusz: The Game is a brutally challenging platformer designed to push players to their limits. Inspired by classics like Mario and Jump King, this game combines traditional platforming mechanics with unique twists that elevate the difficulty to an extreme level. If you're looking for a game that will test your skills, patience, and perseverance, Mariusz: The Game is your ultimate challenge.

Game Mechanics

  • Precise Controls – Success depends entirely on your skill and precision. Every jump, move, and dodge requires perfect timing and coordination.

  • Gravity and Fall Damage – Misjudging a jump or falling from a great height will cost you dearly, whether it’s a loss of health or instant death.

  • Traps – The game is filled with cunning and devious traps, including collapsing platforms, spikes hidden under seemingly safe surfaces, and bottomless pits waiting to swallow you whole.

  • Permanent Death – The most important rule: if you die, you can’t reload your game. You must start over from the very beginning. Every mistake is costly, making every life incredibly precious.

  • Time Records – Beyond completing the game, you can challenge yourself to set a world record. Speed and precision are key – who will emerge as the fastest and most patient master?

World and Progression

  • Scaling Levels – The Levels keeps getting harder, as you play with each level becoming more intense than the last. Expect narrow ledges, moving platforms, and increasingly aggressive enemy placements as you move forward.

  • Adaptive Challenges – Levels are designed to keep you on edge. Environments dynamically shift, adding new traps and hazards the deeper you go.

  • Intelligent Enemy Behavior – Enemies don’t just stand in your way—they react to your actions. Ranged enemies missiles are scaling with the traveled distance and melee fighters charge with ferocity.

.

Core Rules of the Game

  • No Second Chances – Death means a complete reset of your progress. With no save points, every move matters. Precision, patience, and strategic planning are your only tools for survival.

  • Every Move Counts – A poorly timed jump, misstep, or failure to account for gravity can lead to devastating consequences and force you to start over.

  • Weigh the Risks – While you can attempt risky shortcuts or bold jumps, the price of failure might be too high. Careful decision-making is vital.

Who Is This Game For?

Mariusz: The Game is for players seeking a true test of endurance and skill. If you love challenging games that push you to your limits and don't fear the frustration of starting over, this game is for you. Test your patience, reflexes, and determination – do you have what it takes to lead Mariusz to the victory?

Play if you dare. Mariusz is waiting for you and your patience.
